description: This file sets up a vector database connection using Qdrant, initializes a knowledge base with a PDF URL, and defines an interactive agent that responds to user prompts related to Thai recipes. It includes configuration for hybrid search and uses the Typer library for command-line interface.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that handles user interactions and responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads and manages PDF URL data for search.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A class representing the Qdrant vector database connection.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration for different search types, including hybrid.

methods.name: qdrantdb_agent
methods.description: Main function that creates an agent and runs an interactive prompt loop for user queries.
